verbs.description: [ARG1: The Philadelphia Eagles] [V: may] be [ARG2: the latest Super Bowl champions] , but President Trump uninvited the entire team to the White House Super Bowl celebration due to kneeling controversy during the national anthem .

[ARG1: The Philadelphia Eagles] [ARGM-MOD: may] [V: be] [ARG2: the latest Super Bowl champions] , but President Trump uninvited the entire team to the White House Super Bowl celebration due to kneeling controversy during the national anthem .

The Philadelphia Eagles may be the latest Super Bowl champions , but [ARG0: President Trump] [V: uninvited] [ARG1: the entire team] [ARGM-PRD: to the White House Super Bowl celebration] [ARGM-CAU: due to kneeling controversy during the national anthem] .

The Philadelphia Eagles may be the latest Super Bowl champions , but President Trump uninvited the entire team to the White House Super Bowl celebration due to [V: kneeling] [ARG1: controversy] during the national anthem .
